WorkItem.Description:
I'd like to request a feature, please. 
 
Can you build in a way to filter *just* Shadowmourne? I can filter by ilvl, but I'd like to see the 277 heroic ICC upgrades, and let's face it -- it's a huge upgrade for every two-hander plate-wearer and only a very small fraction of us will actually get the item. And in my guild, that won't be me ;P
 
Thanks!
- Aular

Comments.Message: Just uncheck the top "Other" filter under Tier 10 raids

What about generically filtering items by id on a per-character basis?
How about <UnAvailableItems>? Right-click the little diamond thing, select "unavailable" and *poof*, it goes away. ;D

Something like that would definitely help with issues like Trophy gear bleeding into 10-man listings... >.>
Check http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=ItemFiltering on how to filter out individual items.

Also, note the first two points from the recent checkin 45812:

Rawr.ItemFilters:
- Changed 277+ ilevel filter to just 277
- Added 278+ ilevel filter (covers Shadowmourne and other higher items from quest rewards by itself)
- The Gem filters now operate on a Disable basis instead of Enable (check a box to turn off that grouping of gems)
- Added a gem filter that removes green level (+12) and perfect (+14) gems
